data.system_settings: LG X Power running Android Marshmallow 6.0.1
data.short_description: In the friends list menu, there is a 3 dot button which opens the server management dialog for a split second and closes it
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to latest alpha 4.0.8 - Go to your friends list - You can see the 3 dot menu next to the friends search
